title: Whiplash Configuration
description: Schema for the TOML configuration file passed to whiplash via --config.

index_threshold.description: Maximum offset allowed between clean and dirty item indices when matching.

max_failed_items.description: Maximum number of consecutive failures before stopping. 0 disables early stop.

blacklist_atoms.description: Atom names whose extracted values are excluded from matching signatures for all items.

atoms.description: Map of atom names to regex patterns. Atoms are reusable named patterns referenced by item parts.

items.description: Ordered list of item definitions. Each item defines how to match a log entry.

name.description: Unique name identifying this item type.

parts.description: Ordered list of pattern parts concatenated to form the full regex.

atom.description: Reference to a named atom defined in the atoms section.

anchored.description: If true, a match must end on a line boundary.

ignore_atoms.description: Atom names whose values are excluded from this item's matching signature.
